pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service

Interface BookService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookServiceImpl

    public interface BookService
    Interface for managing Book and BorrowedBook objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • getListOfAllBooks

        List<Book> getListOfAllBooks(int startResult)
        Returns the list of the books.
        Parameters:
        startResult - An int containing a value that specifies the first index of returned results.
        Returns:
        A List<Book> representing the list of all books

      • getListOfBooksForGivenSearchParams

        List<Book> getListOfBooksForGivenSearchParams(String[] searchParameters,
                                              int startResult)
        Returns the list of the books for given search parameters.
        Parameters:
        searchParameters - The String[] containing the search parameters
        startResult - An int containing a value that specifies the first index of returned results.
        Returns:
        A List<Book> representing the list of books

                User user)

        user - The User containing the user who borrows the books

      • getExpectedEndDate

        Date getExpectedEndDate(User user,
                        Book book)
        Returns the expected end date of the BorrowedBook for given parameters.
        Parameters:
        user - The User containing the user associated with the BorrowedBook
        book - The Book containing the book associated with the BorrowedBook
        Returns:
        A Date representing the expected end date of the BorrowedBook

        Returns the list of all BorrowedBook objects.

      • addAllBorrowedBookToList

        void addAllBorrowedBookToList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Adds all borrowed books to the list of books to return.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books to return and the list of borrowed books.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session

      • addReturnedBookToList

        void addReturnedBookToList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                           int bookId)
        Adds the book with the given id to the list of books to return.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books to return.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        bookId - The int containing the id of the book

      • deleteReturnedBookFromList

        void deleteReturnedBookFromList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                int bookId)
        Removes the book with given id from the list of books to return.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books to return
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        bookId - The int containing the id of the book

      • returnBooks

        String returnBooks(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Changes the isAvailable status of the Book to TRUE.
        Sets the stopDate of the BorrowedBook.
        Returns a message as a String.

        The session contains the list of the books to return.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        Returns:
        A String representing the message

      • deleteBookFromList

        void deleteBookFromList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                        int bookId)
        Deletes the book with given id form the list of books to borrow.

        The session contains the temporary list of books to borrow.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        bookId - The int containing the id of the book

      • addBookToList

        String addBookToList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                     int bookId,
                     Locale locale)
        Adds the book with given id to the list of books to borrow.
        Returns the message as a String.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books to borrow.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        bookId - The int containing the id of the book
        locale - The Locale containing the user`s locale
        Returns:
        A String representing the message

      • addReservedBookToList

        String addReservedBookToList(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                             int reservationId,
                             Locale locale)
        Adds the book with given id form the list of reservations to the list of books to borrow.
        Returns the message as a String.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books to return.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        reservationId - The int containing the id of the reservation
        locale - The Locale containing the user`s locale
        Returns:
        A String representing the message

      • borrowBooks

        String borrowBooks(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Returns the confirmation message as a String.

        The session contains the temporary list of the books using to create a message
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession containing the user`s session
        Returns:
        A String representing the message
